description: Inherited from Middle English venymously; by surface analysis, venomous +â€Ž -ly.

adverbs.description: venomously (comparative more venomously, superlative most venomously)

entries.meaning: In a venomous manner; with venom.
examples: He spat venomously over the side of the tree and proceeded to tell me how different things had been when he was young.
